Fields Anthony Holland's Innovative

Destroy cancer cells his research

Cancer Treatments like chemotherapy and
radiation which often harm healthy cells
alongside cancerous ones Holland's
experiments involved exposing different
types of cancer cells including those
from the leukemia pancreatic and ovarian
cancers to various frequencies and
observing the effects he discovered that
certain frequencies led to the
disintegration of the cancer cells this
process known as resonant frequency
therapy leverages the concept every
object has a natural frequency at which
it vibrates by identifying and applying
these specific frequencies to cancer
cells Holland aimed to induce a targeted
destruction of these cells without
affecting surrounding healthy tissues
the technique uses custom buil devices
to deliver these frequencies directly to
the cancer cells the initial results
from Holland's laboratory experiments
have been promising showing the
potential of resonant frequency therapy
as a more precise and less harmful
cancer treatment
